markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Walls](/Rules.aspx?ID=635)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 517 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Natural cave walls are uneven, with nooks, crannies, and ledges. Since most caves are formed by water, cave walls are often damp, making them even more difficult to Climb.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Walls

text: Walls Source Core Rulebook pg. 517 4.0 Natural cave walls are uneven, with nooks, crannies, and ledges. Since most caves are formed by water, cave walls are often damp, making them even more difficult to Climb.
